pkgmetadata.longdescription: docker-pushrm is a Docker CLI plugin that adds a new docker pushrm command to Docker. It pushes the README file from the current working directory to a container registry server where it appears as repo description in the web interface. It currently supports Docker Hub, Red Hat Quay and Harbor v2. For most registry types docker-pushrm uses authentication info from the Docker credentials store - so it "just works" for registry servers that you're already logged into with Docker.
